name: HTML
skills: HTML is the foundational markup language used to create and structure content on web pages and applications across the internet.

name: CSS
skills: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a language used for styling web pages, controlling layout, typography, colors, and visual aspects effectively.

name: Tailwind CSS
skills: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that speeds up web development with pre-defined utility classes for streamlined styling.

name: JavaScript
skills: JavaScript powers interactive web experiences, enabling dynamic content updates, user interaction handling, and client-side functionality across modern web applications.

name: React.js
skills: Proficient in building dynamic and responsive web applications using React, with a strong understanding of component-based architecture and state management.

name: Firebase
skills: Firebase provides robust authentication services, enabling secure and easy user sign-in and management for web and mobile applications.

name: MongoDB
skills: MongoDB is a flexible, document-based NoSQL database system, designed for high performance, scalability, and ease of development and deployment.

name: Node.js
skills: Node.js is a powerful, event-driven JavaScript runtime for scalable backend development, enabling server-side scripting and efficient, real-time applications.

name: Express.js
skills: Express is a minimalist, flexible Node.js web application framework providing robust features for building fast, scalable, and efficient server-side applications.
